name: Marimekko Teapot
description:
Marimekko Teapot

Marimekko In Good Company Teapot. The In Good Company range, has been designed for Marimekko by Sami Ruotsalainen with the Rasymatto and Siirtolapuutarha patterns created by Maija Louekari. This minimal teapot depicts a simple and fresh design that's typically Scandinavian.

Dimensions :	Diameter 14cm, Capacity 0.7L

name: Mini Happle Lamp
description: The mini happle lamp makes everything possible even in the darkest corner of your room. As you light it up, not only bright vision is dancing in front of you, but your creative mind is also set free and to the infinity. Sparkling idea and innovation are awaiting at the other end without any doubt. Sir Isaac Newton could attest this best!

name: Vegetal Chair
description:
Vitra
Vegetal
Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, 2008.

Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec‘s interest in organic shapes already manifested itself in 2004 with the design of Algues for Vitra. Based on these experiences, the two brothers collaborated with Vitra over a period of four years to develop Vegetal.

The process involved countless prototypes and an intense exploration of injection moulding technology. The goal was create a chair that aspires to look like natural vegetation while simultaneously incorporating the necessary strength, stability and comfort. The flat, branch-like ribs are asymmetrically intertwined on three levels to form the seat shell, which is shaped as an irregular circle and supported by four legs that appear to sprout from the ground.

Vegetal is available in six colours that are unusual for plastic chairs, emphasising the underlying concept of replicating structures found in nature. It is suitable for indoor or outdoor applications and can be stacked up to three chairs high, which permits flexible use in a variety of settings and in large numbers. The chair is manufactured using a highly energy-efficient process and is made from 100% recyclable polyamide.



Dimensions: 606 x 813 x 577 mm

Colours:
01 Basic Dark (Black)
25 Mauve Grey
29 Brick
30 Cream
40 Chocolate
51 Cactus

Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

name: Corniches (large)
description:
Corniches (large)

Corniches arose from the need for small spaces for the spontaneous storage of miscellaneous objects. 'The same way that we hang our belongings on a rock jutting from a cliff before diving into the sea, we need small, informal storage in everyday life too', explains Ronan Bouroullec. And this is the reason that Corniches are neither regular shelves nor simple horizontal surfaces, but rather individual, isolated protrusions in the environments that we create.

Whether as a key rack beside the front door, a spot to put everything we need to have at our fingertips in the bathroom, a pedestal for a small collection of objects or as a large installation, the Corniches storage ledges are a new way to use the walls in our living spaces.

Shell: ASA plastic, high gloss surface
Wall bracket: polyamide
Delivered: in high-quality gift wrapped package

Available in colours:

White
Black
Japanese red

Lead time approx 3 weeks if in stock, otherwise 6 weeks.

name: Pebble Chair Sage Green. Ex Display
description:
Pebble Chair Sage Green. Ex Display

WAS £310.00
NOW £217.00

Ex display Pebble Chair, designed by Benjamin Hubert.

Designer Benjamin Hubert was inspired by the flat, smooth, rounded stones ‘Pebbles’ that wash ashore on the beach. Pebble is designed with ambitions of high comfort, broad range of applications, minimal environmental impact and, production in the Netherlands. Polyethylene, one of the cleanest types of plastic, is used for the seats. 
Both at home and in projects Pebble offers a fresh and timeless addition to the interior.

Legs solid oak, Stone stain. Leg ring steel with matt black powder coating.

name: E27 Pendant Lamp
description:
E27 Pendant Lamp Designed by MATTIAS STÅHLBOM. 

"E27 departs from the essence of a lamp - the socket – creating a simple yet strong object that celebrates the potential beauty in simplicity. The simplicity of the naked bulb is hard to compete with. It represents something that feels romantic and contemporary at the same time. " 

MATERIAL silicone rubber COLOUR white, dark grey, light grey, yellow, green, light green, red, purple, blue, black, rose, orange 

DIMENSIONS bulb diameter 125 mm, cord length 4 m, 
Maximum 40 Watt Bulb.

name: Aperture Shade Medium (48cm)
description:
Aperture Shade Medium (48cm)

The Aperture Light was designed by Claire Norcross in 2003. This sculptural paper shade was inspired by the nature of a pine cone and its ability to open and close according to the weather conditions. This aspect is reflected in the versatility of the design and the user’s ability to open and close each ‘aperture’ in order to dazzle or diffuse the light. It has a wide ranging application from contract interiors to domestic spaces. 

Aperture is available in 3 sizes:
Small (35cm) £60 
Medium (48cm) £75 
Large (65cm) £110

description:

name: Bulky Teacup White x 2
description:
Bulky Teacup White (Set of 2) by Muuto
Designed by Jonas Wagell

Bulky has a colourful and expressive design with slightly oversized details. Its playful form is inspired by fairy tales and children’s story books where things and shapes were exaggerated and emphasized to fit a kid’s wild imagination. The name Bulky further underlines the over-dimensioned and friendly proportions of the tea set.

name: Willow Tearooms - Architectural Model
description:
Willow Tearooms - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain.

The Willow Tearooms are probably the most famous of Glasgow's many tearooms that opened around the beginning of the 20th century. They were designed entirely by Charles Rennie Mackintosh: he designed the interior, the furniture, internal layout and external architecture as well as the cutlery, menus and the waitress uniforms. The Willow Tearooms are on Sauchiehall Street. The name "Sauchiehall" is derived from "saugh", the Scottish word for a willow tree. This provided the initial design ideas for Mackintosh and his patron Miss Cranston. Willow was the basis of the name for the tearooms and many of the decorative motifs. Our architectural model is of the asymmetric facade.

Each of our architectural models is handmade in our studio in Sussex, England. They are made of strong plaster that has a reassuring weight and smooth, cool feel. The window frames and door are made of etched brass. Stylish ornaments, gifts or presents that are handmade in Britain.

Address: Willow Tearooms, 217 Sauchiehall Street, Glasgow, G2 3EX, Scotland.

30.5cm high, 14cm wide, 6cm deep and 2.5kg approximately.


Leadtime 1-2 weeks. Free UK Delivery.

name: Hoover Building - Architectural Model
description:
Hoover Building - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain.

The Hoover Buildings have long been heralded as a monument to the art deco movement. The Hoover Buildings, designed by Wallis, Gilbert and Partners, are magnificent and a real advertisment for the Hoover company. The beautiful facades were a revolution in the 1930's and the use of colour was especially bold with the light green window frames making the buildings unmistakable.

Chisel & Mouse have produced an architectural model of "Building No.7". It was the last to be constructed and operated as the staff canteen and recreation centre.

Each of the architectural models is handmade in Sussex, England. They are made of strong plaster that has a reassuring weight and smooth, cool feel. The window frames are made of etched brass. Stylish ornaments, gifts or presents that are handmade in Britain.

Address: Western Avenue, London, UB6 8BW, England.

18cm high, 21cm wide, 5.5cm deep & 2.1kg approximately.

Leadtime 1-2 weeks. Free UK Delivery.

name: Glasgow School of Art - Architectural Model
description:
Glasgow School of Art - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain. 

Glasgow School of Art's Mackintosh Building, "The Mac" or "Toshie" as it is commonly known, was voted Britain's favourite building of the last 175 years in a 2009 RIBA poll. It is at the heart of the Glasgow School of Art's campus. Building work was started in 1897 to a design created by the school's most famous alumnus, Charles Rennie Mackintosh. He was a leading proponent of the Arts and Crafts and Art Nouveau movements in the United Kingdom. The Mackintosh Building is his masterwork.

The architectural model is of the slightly off-centre entrance facade. The facade is asymmetric with tower like masonry walls and small windows remembering Scottish baronial architecture.

Each of the architectural models is handmade in Sussex, England. They are made of strong plaster that has a reassuring weight and smooth, cool feel. The window frames and door are made of etched brass. Stylish ornaments, gifts or presents that are handmade in Britain.

Address: Glasgow School of Art, 167 Renfrew Street, Glasgow, G3 6RQ, Scotland.

28cm high, 16.5cm wide, 6.5cm deep and 3.2kg approximately.

Leadtime 1-2 weeks. Free UK Delivery.

name: Charlotte Square - Architectural Model
description:
Charlotte Square - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain.

Charlotte Square is part of the Edinburgh New Town and is designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Building of the square was completed in 1820 to the design of Robert Adam. The north side of Charlotte Square is considered a masterpiece of Georgian urban architecture. It is the epitome of Georgian elegance and refinement. The architectural model is of No.9 which is located on the north side of the square.

Each of the architectural models is handmade in Sussex, England. They are made of strong plaster that has a reassuring weight and smooth, cool feel. The window frames and door are made of etched brass. Stylish ornaments, gifts or presents that are handmade in Britain.

Address: 9 Charlotte Square, Edinburgh, EH2 4DR, Scotland.

25cm high, 16.5cm wide, 6cm deep & 2kg approximately.


Leadtime 1-2 weeks. Free UK Delivery.

name: Battersea Power Station - Architectural Model
description:
Battersea Power Station - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain.

Battersea Power Station, built in 1933, has been crumbling away since shutting down over 20 years ago. Despite its dilapidation the building remains an iconic landmark with its instantly recognisable chimneys. This building is a true London landmark and worthy of the term 'iconic'.

The architectural model of Battersea Power Station's Northern Chimneys is striking. It displays the beauty and function that Sir Giles Gilbert Scott was so famous for and is the perfect example of mantelpiece art.

Each of Chisel & Mouse's architectural models is handmade in Sussex, England. They are made of strong plaster that has a reassuring weight and smooth, cool feel. Stylish ornaments, gifts or presents that are handmade in Britain.

Address: Battersea Power Station, 188 Kirtling Street, London, SW8 5BP, England.

28cm high, 20cm wide, 5.5cm deep & 1.5kg approximately.

Leadtime 1-2 weeks. Free UK Delivery.

name: Greyhound Terminal - Architectural Model
description:
Greyhound Terminal - Architectural Model by Chisel & Mouse.

TOJO are delighted to be a Stockist for Chisel & Mouse Architectural Models, Handmade in Britain.

The old Greyhound Terminal was built as a terminal for Greyhound Bus Lines. Greyhound cleverly adopted the beautiful art deco, streamlined shapes of the 1930's to suggest speed, style and forward thinking. The building was designed by William S Arrasmith and completed in 1940. It remained a bus terminal until sold in 1985. A spirited and successful campaign was mounted to save the Greyhound Terminal and developers were persuaded to keep the building as an entrance to an office block built behind it. The architectural sculpture is of the facade of this stunning example of streamline moderne.

Address: 1100 New York Avenue, Washington, DC 20005, United States.

17cm high, 30cm wide, 7.5cm deep & approx 3kg.

name: Tulip Armchair, White Shell and Base
description:
Saarinen Tulip Armchair
Designed By Eero Saarinen, 1955-1957

This is an original licensed Knoll piece.

The Saarinen Tulip seating collection consists of an armchair and an armless chair, with swivel or fixed base.

The chairs are available with either an upholstered seat cushion, or fully upholstered inner shell with seat cushion. The swivel stool with an upholstered cushion completes the collection. The KnollStudio logo and the signature of Eero Saarinen are located on the underside of the base.

Price listed is for Knoll Felt fabric Seat Pad. White seat shell, SWIVEL base.

Dimensions:
W480 x D590 x H480/820mm

Delivery Time:
8-10 weeks

name: Marimekko Unikko Mug
description:
Wake up. Taste the Flowers. Start your morning with a sip of spring. 

Sami Ruotsalainen designed this mug and handpicked Maija Isola’s beloved Unikko pattern to give it life. Made with hard, glazed porcelain, it has a long lifespan and a pattern that won’t fade or wear off. Part of the Oiva dinnerware collection created just for Marimekko.

Keep in mind the collection is dishwasher, freezer and microwave safe.

name: Record Coasters
description:
Every drink is a hit on a record coaster! 

Enjoy this set of four silicone record coasters every time you're drinking your favorite hit beverage.

Washable and dishwasher safe, these coasters will put a new spin on protecting your furniture.

name: The Flipper
description:
Serve up some Rock n' Roll with The Flipper Guitar Spatula. Perfect for eggs, pancakes, or the Elvis special -- fried peanut butter and banana sandwiches.

The Flipper is 50% rock, 50% roll and 100% Silicone. It's dishwasher safe and tested up to 500º. Crank up the heat, crank up the jams, and get cookin'!

Available in Red, Black and Electric Blue!

name: M-Cups
description: Matryoshkas made to measure.This set of 6 dry-measure cups nests neatly just like traditional Russian matryoshkas. They accurately measure 1/4, 1/3, 1/2, 2/3, 3/4 and 1 full cup, and they're built from heavy-duty, food-safe, long-life engineering plastics. They're useful, easy to store, and quite charming...so why not doll up your kitchen with a little Russian folklore?

name: Saarinen Round Dining Table
description:
The Saarinen Round Table was designed by Eero Saarinen in 1957.

This is an original licensed Knoll piece.

The natural Marble Arabescato top features a protective seal. The White base is constructed from molded, cast aluminum strap polished and coated in tough, abrasion-resistant rilsan finish.

Tables are available in wood, laminate, coated and natural marble, natural granite and in a wide range of colors. The Base finish is available in white, black or platinum. Please contact us for further details.

Dimensions:
W x 107 D x 107 H x 72

Delivery:
8-10 weeks

name: Bertoia Side Chair
description:
Bertoia side chair with seat pad, polished chrome designed by Harry Bertoia in 1952.

This is an original licensed Knoll piece.

The frame is welded steel with rods of chrome. It is also available in polish or powder-coated paint and a variety of color finishes.

The Side chair is available unupholstered, with a replaceable seat cushion and back pad, or full cover. Seat cushions and back pads are secured to the chair with domed metal lock snaps and have fabric edges.

Upholstery is available in a wide range of Knoll Textiles. Please contact us for further details.

Dimensions:
W 54 x D 58 x H x 74/104

Delivery Time:
8-10 weeks

name: Coconut Chair
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

Vitra

George Nelson, 1955

Delivery time: 7-9 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

The Coconut is a typical 1950s design – it stands out for its humorous touch, formal clarity and minimal use of materials. Nelson himself compared it with a coconut cut into eight parts, and inverted the coconut’s colours: the plastic seat shell is white, while the single-section upholstery comes in a variety of colours.

Dimensions:

835 × 1040 × 830 mm

Please note: The Product will arrive BOXED, the box is larger than the above dimensions.

72 Snow

Shell: White, fibreglass-reinforced plastic.
Upholstery: Single-piece upholstery, polyurethane foam.
Base: Polished chrome tubular steel.

Also available in Hopsak fabric please contact us.

name: Aluminium Group Chair EA119
description:
Aluminium Group Chair EA119
Charles & Ray Eames, 1958

The Aluminium Chair is one of the greatest furniture designs of the 20th century. The Aluminium Chair stands out for its intelligent combination of materials. The covers are attached inside the aluminium profile sections and simply stretched over the frame, transforming them from mere coverings to a load-bearing part of the structure. It adapts to fit the body snugly and delivers great comfort, even without extensive upholstery.

Vitra has produced the Aluminium Chair programme for many decades to a consistently high quality. On the basis of this experience we are now granting a 30-year guarantee on all chairs of the Aluminium Group.

High Backrest
With Armrests

Version Leather, and Chrome Base:
Leather front seat upholstery with Plano fabric on the back:
Leather / Plano Colours:

66 Nero/ 66 Nero
67 Asphalt / 69 Dark Grey
68 Chocolate / 54 Brown
69 Marron / 54 Brown
70 Red / 72 Poppy Red
71 Sand / 71 Mauve Grey
72 Snow / 88 White

Unless, requested, the Castors will be for CARPET.
Castors for hard floors are available at no extra cost.

Mechanism:
Adjustable back tilt mechanism, can be locked in forward position. Seat can be set at any height thanks to pneumatic spring.
Backrest and Seat:
Upholstery elements in Leather (Plano back), high frequency welded. Side profiles and clamping bracket in chromed die-cast aluminium.
Base: Five-star base in die-cast aluminium, with hard castors for carpets.

Jasper Morrison, 2012


New to the HAL Family is the HAL Ply Wood Chair.
Seat shell in Light Oak or Dark Oak, with matching wooden legs.

Non stackable wooden base in Light Oak, or Dark Oak.
Dimensions: 790 × 470 × 490

We have 4 Light Oak Hal Chairs on display at TOJO, Glasgow.
Lead time 8-9 weeks at present for Dark Oak.

description:
HAL
Jasper Morrison, 2010/2011


HAL Wood
Non stackable wooden base in Light or Dark Oak.
Seat shell dyed through polypropylene.

The shape of HAL's shell ensures plenty of freedom of movement, and the slightly flexible plastic makes many different sitting positions possible - even sideways and astride the chair.

Seat Shell Colours:

Glides will be black.

Lead times approx 8-10 weeks from order.

description: Desperate Lady or Desperate Gent Tile, designed by O Street in Glasgow for The Lighthouse Building.

name: Eames Plastic Armchair DAW
description:
Vitra 
Eames Plastic Armchair DAW 
Charles & Ray Eames, 1950


Charles & Ray Eames presented the designs 
for the Plastic Chair group at the "Low Cost 
Furniture Design" competition held by the 
museum of modern art in new York. in 1950, 
they were the first industrially manufactured 
plastic chairs to be brought to market.

Materials: polypropylene seat shell, dyed through. 

DAR = Dining Height Armchair Wooden Base
Base: Wooden base, stained and lacquered in maple. Round steel cross struts in basic dark.

Dimensions: 805 × 625 × 600 mm

Colours: 
01 Basic Dark (Black) 
03 Poppy Red 
04 White 
21 Ocean 
25 Mauve Grey 
30 Cream 
31 Stone White 
34 Mustard

description:
Vitra
Eames Plastic Side Chair DAR
Charles & Ray Eames, 1950

Charles & Ray Eames presented the designs 
for the Plastic Chair group at the "Low Cost 
Furniture Design" competition held by the 
museum of modern art in new York. in 1950, 
they were the first industrially manufactured 
plastic chairs to be brought to market.



Materials: polypropylene seat shell, dyed through. Base Chrome.

name: Eames Plastic Side Chair DSR
description:
Vitra
Eames Plastic Side Chair DSR
Charles & Ray Eames, 1950

Eames Plastic Side Chair is a contemporary version of the legendary Fiberglass Chair. It was produced in collaboration with Zenith Plastics for the Museum of Modern Art in New York's Low-Cost Furniture Design Competition and was the first industrially manufactured plastic chair.

Materials: polypropylene seat shell, dyed through. Base Chrome.

DSR = Dining Height Side Chair Rod Base

Dimensions: 810 x 465 x 550mm

Colours:
01 Basic Dark (Black)
03 Poppy Red
04 White
21 Ocean
25 Mauve Grey
30 Cream
31 Stone White
34 Mustard

The following colours are in UK Stock with an approximate 3 week leadtime:
White, Mustard, Basic dark, Mauve Grey & Ocean.
Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

name: Eames Plastic Side Chair DSW
description:
Vitra
Eames Plastic Side Chair DSW
Charles & Ray Eames, 1950


Eames Plastic Side Chair is a contemporary version of the legendary Fiberglass Chair. It was produced in collaboration with Zenith Plastics for the Museum of Modern Art in New York's Low-Cost Furniture Design Competition and was the first industrially manufactured plastic chair.

Materials: polypropylene seat shell, dyed through. Wood and wire base with cross struts, non stacking.

DSW = Dining Height Side Chair Wooden Base

Dimensions: 810 x 465 x 550mm

Colours:
01 Basic Dark (Black)
03 Poppy Red
04 White
21 Ocean
25 Mauve Grey
30 Cream
31 Stone White
34 Mustard

The following colours are in UK Stock with an approximate 3 week leadtime:
White, Mustard, Mauve Grey & Ocean

Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

name: Grand Repos Chair & Ottoman
description:
Grand Repos Chair & Ottoman
Antonio Citterio, 2011


Grand Repos and Repos stand in the tradition of the classic lounge chair, but have developed this concept further to reach a new level. With their generous padding and continuously adjustable sitting positions, these chairs fulfil almost all demands with respect to comfortable, relaxing seating.
The Italian designer and architect Antonio Citterio knows how to combine timeless elegance with unsurpassed comfort. He has worked with Vitra regularly for around 25 years and during this time has created a variety of designs – including several pioneering office chairs. After many years of experience in creating dynamic and healthy seating, he has now applied his expertise to the private living area, with Grand Repos as his premiere piece.

Lead time approx 8-10 weeks.

options.name: Cosy Fabric colour 01 Pebble Grey, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 02 Fossil, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 03 Nutmeg, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 04 Velvet Brown, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 05 Aubergine, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 06 Dark Aubergine, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 07 Green Forest, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 08 Black Forest, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 09 Night Blue, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 10 Classic Grey, Base Polished
Cosy Fabric colour 11 Merino Black, Base Polished

name: Pebble Chair
description:
Pebble Chair
Benjamin Hubert


Designer Benjamin Hubert was inspired by the flat, smooth, rounded stones ‘Pebbles’ that wash ashore on the beach. Pebble is designed with ambitions of high comfort, broad range of applications, minimal environmental impact and, production in the Netherlands. To ensure minimal environmental impact Pebble can be completely disassembled. Thus, all components are easily recycled and transport volume is reduced to a minimum. Polyethylene, one of the cleanest types of plastic, is used for the seats. 
Both at home and in projects Pebble offers a fresh and timeless addition to the interior.

The Pebble chair is available in 5 colours:
White, Light Grey, Anthracite, Sage Green, Army Green.

Legs solid oak, clear varnish. Leg ring steel with matt black powder coating.

Lead times 8 weeks.

name: Mr Food Face
description:
Turns every meal into a masterpiece.

Here's a chance for junior to play with his food and exercise his creativity at the same time! So bring-on the mash potatoes and peas... the possibilities are endless!Our Food Face plate is mid-size (9" diameter) and crafted from hotel-quality, food-safe, high-fire ceramics. It's individually gift boxed with lots of inspirational (and inspired) food art. Wouldn't YOU have loved it when you were a kid?

name: Miss Food Face
description:
Dinner meets dress up.

Here's a way to eat and make a fashion statement at the same time! Give Ms Food Face a broccoli bouffant or a mashed potato makeover. 8.5 inches in diameter and crafted from hotel-quality, food-safe, high-fire ceramics, Ms Food Face is deliciously fun!

name: Butterfly Stool Palisander
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

Butterfly Stool
Sori Yanagi, 1954

The Butterfly Stool combines eastern shapes 
with the technique of shaping plywood which 
Charles and Ray Eames developed. The gently 
curved outline of the two seat shells is remi­niscent of a butterfly’s wings.  
­Material: lacquered moulded plywood, 
brass fittings. 

Moulded Palisander Plywood

Leadtime 6-8 weeks.

name: Butterfly Stool Maple
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

Butterfly Stool 
Sori Yanagi, 1954


The Butterfly Stool combines eastern shapes 
with the technique of shaping plywood which 
Charles and Ray Eames developed. The gently 
curved outline of the two seat shells is remi­niscent of a butterfly’s wings. 
­Material: lacquered moulded plywood, 
brass fittings. 

Moulded Maple Plywood

Leadtime 6-8 weeks.

name: Eames LCW Plywood Chair
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery


Charles & Ray Eames spent many years experimenting
with new processes for optimising
the way three-dimensionally moulded plywood
fits the contours of the body. The result was
the Plywood Group, with its moulded plywood
seat, backrest and base.

LCW = Lounge Chair Wood
-	Backrest/Seat: moulded plywood in ash,
either natural or stained red or black.

-	Base: moulded plywood in colour to match
seat, attached to the seat and backrest
shells with rubber-and-metal shock mounts.

Leadtime 7-8 weeks.

name: Saarinen Womb Chair
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery


Womb Chair, designed by Eero Saarinen 1946

Lead times 8-9 weeks.

Womb Chair with Cushions
Priced in Knoll Felt Fabric

Dimensions
Chair 106cm W x 94cm D x 92cm H with seat height of 45cm

Features Eero Saarinen's 1948 Womb chair, made exclusively for Knoll, displays the Finnish-born designer's flair for challenging rules, breaking molds and setting new standards for modern design. The Womb chair is available in three sizes: standard, medium and small. The standard and medium size have an accompanying ottoman. The Knoll logo is stamped into the structure of the chair and the ottoman. Construction: The chair is constructed of foam over a moulded, reinforced fibreglass shell.

The ottoman is constructed of foam cushion over moulded plywood platform.

Includes separate seat, back and ottoman cushions of polyester fibre with foam core.

Both chair and ottoman feature stainless steel and nylon articulating glides.
Finishes: The base features a steel rod legs with polished chrome finish.

Upholstered in a range of fabrics. These products are available with foam that meets requirements for BS5852.

name: Lamino Chair
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery


Lamino, designed by Yngve Ekstrom 1956

Easy Chair, High back

Lead Time, approximately 8 weeks

Voted "the 20th Century's Best Swedish Furniture Design" at the turn of the millenium. 

Measurements
Easy chair
W 70 
H 101
SH 41
D 78

Material
Frame: Laminated beech, oak or walnut veneer. Oak version available with teak armrests. Also available in ash wood veneer with white or black lazur finish.
Upholstery: Sheepskin (black, 
off white, graphite grey, charcoal (darker) grey, Espresso (brown), Sahara (light brown), fabric or leather.

Other

Eco labelled with the Swedish Swan. 


Lamino in beech or oak is approved by Möbelfakta.

name: Bute Troon Throw
description:
Bute Fabrics, Throw in Troon Fabric

In Stock

Bute Fabric's 'Troon Throw' which bears a fine, traditional houndstooth pattern of exquisite softness and first-class quality.
This throw measures 137 x 200 cms.

2 colours available:
Code 2121, a 'raspberry' colour with dark houndstooth pattern, please see the attached image.
Code 2727, a 'green' colour with dark houndstooth pattern, please see the attached image.

Bute is a modern company with a traditional heritage. Although founded more than fifty years ago on the Isle of Bute by the 5th Marquess, Bute are now more at home collaborating  with leading contemporary designers such as Tom Dixon, Jasper Morrison and Matthew Hilton.

name: Cherner Chair, Classic Walnut
description:
Norman Cherner, 1958

One of TOJO's favourite Chairs!

To Order.
Lead times, if in stock in Europe, approx 3 weeks. 

The 1958 molded plywood armchair by Norman Cherner a midcentury icon found in design collections worldwide is now available to a new generation of furniture collectors. Reissued in exacting detail from the original drawings and molds, the armchair combines the best of both molded plywood and solid bent wood construction. Like the original, made entirely in the U.S.A.

The armchair elegantly combines 
a unique molded plywood shell of tapering thickness, a solid bent wood arm and a laminated wood base.

name: Tip Ton
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

Barber Osgerby, 2011 

To Order.
Lead Times approx 8 weeks.

Tip Ton defines a whole new chair typology: the solid plastic chair with forward-tilt action. Its name refers to the two types of sitting experiences that characterise the chair – from a normal position, Tip Ton can be tilted a few degrees forward where it then stays in place. The innovation behind this seemingly simple feature lies in the skids, which rise at a nine-degree angle. The forward-tilt sitting position, until now the preserve of mechanical office chairs, straightens the pelvis and spine and thus improves circulation to the abdominal and back muscles. Thanks to its striking appearance, Tip Ton is an outstanding dining table or home-office solution; it is also ideal for use in restaurants, conference and meeting spaces and educational institutions.

Tip Ton has set a new benchmark for dynamic
sitting and defined a new typology: the plastic
chair with forward-tilt action. From the normal
position, Tip Ton can be tilted a few degrees
forward, where it then stays in place. The
forward-tilt sitting position, until now the pre-
serve of mechanical office chairs, straightens
the pelvis and spine and thus improves
circulation. Tip Ton is the first product to arise
from the collaboration between Vitra, Edward
Barber and Jay Osgerby.
- Backrest, seat, base: Polypropylene.
- Glides: Polyethylene.
- Stackability: up to 4 Tip Ton chairs can be
stacked on the floor.

name: String Pocket
description:
Made in Sweden by String Furniture

Free UK Mainland Delivery

String Pocket Shelves:

W60 x D15 x H50cm

Fixed combinations consisting of 2 side panels and 3 shelves.
Finishes in stock:
White 
Yellow

name: Gin and Titonic
description: Gin and Titonic is guaranteed to be an unsinkable addition to your next party or boat launching. This reusable ice tray contains four icy Titanic ships, and four menacing icebergs.

name: Lean Floor Lamp
description:
Lead time 4-5 weeks.
Design	 Jenny Bäck
Electrical data	Class II IP20
Description	Black or white Structure lacquer with arm in rough brass. Adjustable shade
Connection	2.5 m textile cord with floor switch and plug
Light source	
1x12W E27 fluorescent lamp

name: Sparrow Keyring Set
description:
Cute little sparrow to guard your keys.
Sparrow has a whistle, the House attaches to your wall, waiting for Sparrow to roost at night!

Available in yellow and black.

name: Eames Hang it all
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

Charles & Ray Eames, 1953

Used instead of simple hooks, these brightly-coloured wooden spheres were aimed at encouraging children to hang up "all their things". Because the distance between the spheres always remains the same, Hang it can be extended as required and is a cheerful alternative to boring clothes-hooks, not only for children's rooms. Collection Vitra Design Museum.

Lead time approx 2-3 weeks.

name: Eames Lounge Chair & Ottoman
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

FREE Eames Stool of your choice:
Model A, B or C in Solid Walnut or Black Stool.


Vitra
Lounge Chair & Ottoman
Charles & Ray Eames, 1956

Delivery time: 7-9 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

The Lounge Chair is one of the most famous designs by Charles and Ray Eames. Created in 1956 it is now a classic in the history of modern furniture.
Since 1956, the Eames Lounge Chair has combined ultimate comfort with both materials and workmanship of the highest quality. In the tradition of the English club chair, which inspired this classic design by Charles and Ray Eames, the original appearance of the Lounge Chair was defined by a dark wood veneer and black leather. 

Materials: Seat and backrest shells and armrests in bent plywood, connection with rubber/metal shock connection (shock mounts), removable upholstery with leather covers.

Dimensions: 840 x 840 x 850-910mm
420 x 630 x 560mm

Please note: The Product will arrive BOXED, the box is larger than the above dimensions.

Leather Premium:
66 Nero
68 Chocolate
77 Brown
72 Snow

Shell: Cherry
Base polished, base sides black.

Other finishes available, please contact us.

base polished, sides black, shell cherry, leather premium Nero shell cherry, leather Snow

name: Panton Chair
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery

The following colours are in UK Stock with an approximate 3 week leadtime:
White & Basic dark.
Delivery time otherwise: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.
**4 x WHITE in STOCK at TOJO**

Vitra
Panton Chair
Verner Panton, 1999

Because of technical progress in plastics processing, the Panton Chair has been through a number of production phases since its original launch. The last version of the chair authorised by Verner Panton was produced in collaboration with the designer at the end of the 1990s. This model realised one of Panton's fundamental objectives for the first time: a plastic chair as an inexpensive industrial product.

Material: polypropylene seat shell, dyed through, matt surface.

Dimensions: 830 x 500 x 610mm

Colours:
01 Basic Dark (Black)
04 White
23 Ice Grey
27 Tangerine
28 Classic Red
32 Chartreuse

name: Tulip Side Chair, White shell and base
description:
Saarinen Tulip Side Chair
Designed By Eero Saarinen, 1955-1957

This is an original licensed Knoll piece.

The Saarinen Tulip seating collection consists of an armchair and an armless chair, with swivel or fixed base.

The chairs are available with either an upholstered seat cushion, or fully upholstered inner shell with seat cushion. The swivel stool with an upholstered cushion completes the collection. The KnollStudio logo and the signature of Eero Saarinen are located on the underside of the base.

Price listed is for Knoll Felt fabric Seat Pad. White seat shell, SWIVEL base.

Dimensions:
W490 x D530 x H490/810mm

Delivery Time:
8-10 weeks

name: Barcelona Chair
description:
FREE MAINLAND UK DELIVERY
Delivery time: Quickship available in Black Velluto Pelle or Sabrina White, 4 weeks. Standard lead time 8-9 weeks. Products are made to order in Italy.


Knoll
Barcelona® Chair
Designed By Ludwig Mies Van der Rohe, 1929-1931

A signature KnollStudio design, produced to Mies' original specifications.
Exclusive manufacturing and sales rights were accorded to Knoll by the designer in 1953. The Barcelona chair is also available in the Kid version. 
The KnollStudio logo and the signature of Mies van der Rohe are stamped into the base of each chair.

Construction:
Polished chrome structure hand-buffed and hand-finished to a mirror finish.
The cushions are upholstered with 40 individual panels cut, hand-welted and hand-tufted from a single hide.
Seat and back cushions adapt to fit the curve of the frame.
Side and edges of upholstery straps are dyed to match specified upholstery colour.
Finishes:
Available in a range of Spinneybeck leathers.
The frame is available polish chrome. This product is available with foam that meets requirements for BS5852.

Awards: Museum of Modern Art Award, 1977

Dimensions:
75cm W x 77cm D x 77cm H with seat height of 43cm

Price shown for W Grade Leather:
The Barcelona Chair is available in more than 500 colours and 5 different grades (W, X, Y, Z and N). Please refer to www.spinneybeck.com to view the W Grade Leathers. Please contact us at hello@tojodesign.com to request leather samples and different leather grade prices.

Barcelona stool with cushion sold separately.

name: Caravaggio Pendant P1
description:
FREE UK Mainland Delivery.
In Stock.

Caravaggio P1 (ø165 mm) is a series of metalpendants with an eye-catching high gloss lacquer.  The suspension technology is masculine in construction, creating the right counterbalance to the shade's feminine lines. Caravaggio is characterised by direct light without glare. The uplight from the pendant's top also adds to the room's ambient light. This pendant is named after the Italian Baroque painter Caravaggio, who is known for his dramatic paintings with large constrast between light and shadow. Caravaggio P1 is suitable for interior design in cafés, restaurants, retail shops and private homes.

Design by Cecilie Manz
The Caravaggio pendant is made of drawn steel and coated with smooth, high-gloss lacquer. The suspension technology is masculine in construction, creating the right counterbalance to the shade's feminine lines.
 
Surface:
Black high gloss lacquer

Material:
Shade: Drawn steel.
Suspension: Curved steel roods and turned brass coated in matt chrome.
 
Installation:
Suspension: Red textile cable 2x0,75 mm2.
Canopy: White   
Cable length: 3000 mm./6000 mm.
 
Light source:
E27 max 42 W: 20.5cm; Diameter : 16.5cm

Diameter 165mm, H205mm

Available in:
Black High Gloss Lacquer/ Red Textile Cable
White High Gloss Lacquer/ Grey Textile Cable

The suspension technology is masculine in construction, creating the right counterbalance to the shade's feminine lines. Caravaggio is characterised by direct light without glare. The uplight from the pendant's top also adds to the room's ambient light. This pendant is named after the Italian Baroque painter Caravaggio, who is known for his dramatic paintings with large constrast between light and shadow. Caravaggio P2 is suitable for interior design in cafés, restaurants, retail shops and private homes.

Design by Cecilie Manz
The Caravaggio pendant is made of drawn steel and coated with smooth, high-gloss lacquer. The suspension technology is masculine in construction, creating the right counterbalance to the shade's feminine lines.

name: Eames Plastic Armchair RAR
description:
Free UK Mainland Delivery


Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

Vitra
Eames Plastic Armchair 
RAR
Charles & Ray Eames, 1950

Plastic Armchairs were first presented as part of the famed New York Museum of Modern Art competition, "Low Cost Furniture Design". Their organically shaped seat shells made of fibreglass-reinforced plastic were later combined with various different bases, such as RAR's rockers and manufactured in their millions. In their latest version made of polypropylene the Armchairs now offer even greater sitting comfort.

Material: Seat shell in polypropylene, dyed through, four-legged braced wire base on two wooden rockers with clear varnish. Base chromed, without seat upholstery.

RAR = Rocking Armchair Rod Base

Dimensions: 670 x 625 x 690mm

Colours:
01 Basic Dark (Black)
03 Poppy Red
04 White
21 Ocean
25 Mauve Grey
30 Cream
31 Stone White
34 Mustard

name: The Spark Series Side Chair
description:
Spark brings energy to every space with its bright colors and unique personality. A perfect balance of form and function, the chairs are pleasing to the eye, comfortable and efficient for general purpose use, stacking and storage.

Four Leg Stacking Side Chair
H78.5 W50.5 D54.5cm
Side and lounge chairs stack 6 high on the floor.


Unupholstered version approved for indoor and outdoor use (waterproof, UV protected).


Smooth, round edges and contoured seats and backs add comfort


Wall-saver design, integral glides and stacking spacers protect finishes





Finishes

Red, Blue, Citron, Light Grey, Dark Grey and Recycled Black finishes


Recycled Black finish is made of 40% recycled content

name: Eames Elephant
description:
Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

Vitra
Eames Elephant
Charles & Ray Eames, 1945

Almost no other animal enjoys such popularity as the elephant. Admired for its majestic size and loved for its proverbial good-humour, it is part of our everyday experience as a child's cuddly toy, a storybook character and a majestic creature. Charles and Ray Eames also succumbed to their charms and in 1945 designed a toy elephant made of plywood. However, it never made it into mass production. The Eames elephant is now available for the first time in a plastic version for those it was originally intended for: children.
Whether used as a toy (also outdoors) or a decorative item in a children's room - this friendly-looking animal with its distinctive, over-sized ears is bound to bring cheer and enjoyment to many a child's and parent's heart.
GS and CE certified

Material: batch-dyed polypropylene, matt surface.

Dimensions: 415 x 410 x 785mm

Colours:
White
Ice Grey
Classic Red
Light Pink
Dark Lime

name: Ribbon Light Ash
description:
Delivery time: 2-3 weeks. Products are made to order in Cornwall.


Tom Raffield makes each of these large feature pendant lights using traditional steam bending techniques. Each has a unique signature of looping ash illuminated by a compact low energy lamp.

Specification:
Ash, with a white braided flex.

The Ribbon pendant uses a low energy compact fluorescent with 15,000 hours of life.

Dimensions:
550 diameter x 320 high

Made in Cornwall.

name: Eames House Bird
description:
Delivery time: 4 weeks, otherwise 1 week if in stock. Products are made to order in Germany.

Vitra
Eames House Bird
other, 1910

Charles and Ray Eames augmented the interior “collage” of the Eames House with numerous objects brought back from their extensive travels. The figure of a black wooden bird — evidently one of their most prized objects of American folk art — has stood in the centre of their living room for over fifty years. Also seen as an accessory in many of the Eames’ photographs.

Materials: black lacquered solid alder, steel wire.

Dimensions: 276 x 85 x 278mm

painted black

name: Ball Clock
description:
Delivery time: 6-8 weeks. Products are made to order in Germany.

Vitra
Ball Clock
George Nelson, 1948

With the diversity of materials used and their sculptural shapes, George Nelson’s clocks embody the joie de vivre of the 1950s. To this day, his wall clocks remain a refreshing alternative to the usual timekeepers. The Vitra Design Museum presents a re-edition of the designs so cherished by collectors in true to the original form. Vitra Design Museum Collection.

Materials: lacquered wood and metal, high-grade quartz clockwork, incl. battery.

Diameter 330mm

Colours:
Multicoloured
Orange
Natural
Red
